You have impacted life of 12 children uptill now Shwas is an effort started by a group of volunteers to educate the underprivileged kids of Gulbai Tekra, Ahmedabad since year 2009. We attempt to provide safe and healthy environment to children coming from disadvantaged families, so that they can openly share with us the challenges they face that hold them back from aspiring their dreams We teach kids every day for two hours. Our focus is value based education which includes teaching manners, inculcating sense of hygiene and helping them to follow and fulfil their dreams. Rate us on play store, tell others about your experience. Rate Us Help Share Suggestion Here, secret code is for Impact League.
Impact League is a Walkathon oraganised by us where you and your colleagues compete with each other to raise charity.
Walk. Help. Win!

Great idea right?
To know more shoot us a mail at contact@impactrun.com

See you there. What's This? Exit League Some error occurred Network error, please retry Network error, can't exit Choose your department Choose your location Email Please! We will respond you back on this email id. Thank you :) e.g. john@gmail.com Please enter a valid email address Nothing to display here! AWESOME! NGOs come on-board We check all the documents and past work of a registered NGO. After studying their proposed project plan, we welcome the NGO to Impact family. How it works? Swipe to pick a cause Swipe right to see all our ongoing and completed causes Let's Go for an Impact walk Tap and go for a walk/jog to raise money for this cause. Open the drawer Open the menu drawer to access profile, leaderboard, impact league, help center and more. Stay updated with feed Tap here to open the news feed. You'll find all our community milestones, users' impact-stories and the grass-root work of our non-profits in here. Our total impact This is the total amount raised collectively by our community till now. Thanks to you and 40k+ more users like you. We're happy to help Click on the help center to get all questions answered and issues resolved. Know your streak count Click to see your daily progress or edit your daily goal. My Stats Tap and swipe, play with the graph to view your statistics. You may also mail us at
